net.bluebones.boggle
Class Turn

java.lang.Object
  net.bluebones.boggle.Turn
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Turn
extends Object
implements Serializable

Represents the result of a round for a given player.

Version:
0.3 $Revision: 1.3 $
Author:
Thomas David Baker
See Also:
